high_descs: Stand up turn around move towards the bed.
Take the news paper on the table.
Turn around move towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Take the news paper on table and switch on the desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the bed side.
Pick up the newspaper from the bed.
Turn right towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the newspaper and Turn on desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and go straight towards the bed
Pick up newspaper from the bed
Turn right towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a newspaper by the light of a desk lamp
